nodes.name: Schedule Trigger
nodes.notes: Triggers 3 times daily (every 8 hours) at 8AM, 4PM, and 12AM

assignments.name: post_content

nodes.name: Prepare Content
nodes.notes: Selects random content from predefined Licensify driving-related posts

nodes.name: Generate AI Image
nodes.notes: Generates driving-related image using AI based on the selected content

nodes.name: Wait for Image Generation
nodes.notes: Waits for AI image generation to complete

nodes.name: Get Generated Image
nodes.notes: Retrieves the generated image URL from Replicate API

nodes.name: Create Instagram Media Container
nodes.notes: Creates media container for Instagram post using Facebook Graph API

nodes.name: Wait for Media Processing
nodes.notes: Waits for Instagram to process the media container

nodes.name: Publish to Instagram
nodes.notes: Publishes the media container to Instagram feed

nodes.name: Check Publication Status
nodes.notes: Checks if the Instagram post was published successfully

assignments.name: success_message
assignments.value: ‚úÖ Licensify Instagram post published successfully at {{ $json.post_time }}! Post ID: {{ $('Publish to Instagram').item.json.id }}

nodes.name: Success Response
nodes.notes: Formats success message with post details

assignments.name: error_message
assignments.value: ‚ùå Failed to publish Licensify Instagram post. Please check your credentials and try again.

nodes.name: Error Response
nodes.notes: Formats error message for failed posts

meta.description: Automated Instagram posting workflow for Licensify driving app. Posts 3 times daily with AI-generated images and driving-related content for learner drivers.
